# Overview

This lab will help you understand coordinate systems and map projections.  It is also broken into two parts.  

**First** you will work through a tutorial on map projections to learn how to work with projections in ArcGIS Pro

* Complete the four exercises and answer a series of questions relating to content in each exercise.

**Then** Make a visual comparison of four different coordinate systems that can be used to represent the Canada.

* Submit a map and answer an essay question.
